ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا فَتَحْنَا لَكَ فَتْحًا مُّبِينًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Truly We have granted you a clear victory,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: WE HAVE GIVEN you a splendent victory
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Prophet), surely We have granted you a clear victory
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have granted to you, (Muhammad), a manifest victory,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We have indeed, for your sake (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), bestowed a clear victory.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, We have given you a manifest victory.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We have given to you a clear victory
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely We have given thee a manifest victory,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! We have given thee (O Muhammad) a signal victory,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Truly, We have granted you a clear victory
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! a victory We have given thee, a manifest victory.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed We have inaugurated for you a clear victory,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily We have granted thee a manifest Victory:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, We have given you (O Muhammad SAW) a manifest victory.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, We have opened for you (Prophet Muhammad) a clear opening,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We have granted you a conspicuous victory.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, We have given you, [O Muhammad], a clear conquest
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [48:1] Verily We have given you, We have ordained [for you] the conquest (fath) of Mecca, and other places in the future by force, as a result of your struggle, a clear victory, [one that is] plain and manifest;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said in the interpretation of Allah's saying (Lo! We have given thee (0 Muhammad) a signal victory): '(Lo! We have given thee (0 Muhammad) a signal victory) without fighting, and the treaty of al-Hudaybiyyah is part of this victory, except that in al- Hudaybiyyah they threw stones at each other; it is also said that this means: We have enjoined for you a manifest judgement; We honoured you with Islam and prophethood and commanded you to call people to them,
